plot: Overbearing Western TV series star Rance McGrew is transported back in time to the real Wild West and comes face-to-face with the real Jesse James, who is not happy about how he and his fellow outlaws are being portrayed on Rance's show.

Rance McGrew is the star of a weekly TV western where he plays the town Marshal. He is, to say the least, difficult to deal with. He is frequently late on the set, arrives unprepared and often requests script changes just as they are about to shoot a scene. To top it off, he's quite inept at handling his gun which he inadvertently tosses into the saloon mirror on more than one occasion. He's given a dose of reality however when he inexplicably finds himself back in time, coming face to face with the real Jesse James.—garykmcd
